name: grep-fifo
description: ES6 compliant and (typescript friendly) implementation of circular fifo in c.

scripts.make: emcc --bind -O1 -s WASM=1 -s BINARYEN_ASYNC_COMPILATION=0 -s SINGLE_FILE=1 fifo.c -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS="[_fifo_init, _fifo_read, _fifo_write, _fifo_size]" -o fifo.wasmodule.ts --post-js ./es6.js
